channel.title: My Data Science Portfolio on Gaurav Kamble
channel.description: Recent content in My Data Science Portfolio on Gaurav Kamble

item.title: Project I : Tesla Stock Price Prediction
item.description: Referred the Tesla Stock Price dataset from Kaggle Used the feature which included the Closing Stock Prices from the dataset Built a Recurrent Neural Network model using LSTM to forecast the future Stock Prices of the Tesla Company Trained the DL model on 1117 records and tested it on 575 records Achieved : Training RMSE = 7.00 Testing RMSE = 11.

item.title: Project II : Face Mask Detection
item.description: Referred the Face Mask Detection dataset from Kaggle Built a CNN model with Transfer Learning using the convolutional layers of the VGG16 model Generated extra data from the existing dataset by using Data Augmentation Trained the CNN model on 10,000 images, validated it on 800 images and tested the model on 992 images Achieved : Training Accuracy = 95.

item.title: Project III : Cardiovascular Disease Prediction
item.description: Referred the Cardiovascular Disease dataset from Kaggle Built an ANN model to predict whether a person is suffering from cardiovascular disease or not Performed EDA and handled outliers present within the dataset Used Keras Tuner to optimize the hyperparameters of the ANN model Achieved : Training Accuracy = 99 % Testing Accuracy = 83 % GitHub Link of the Project

item.title: Project IV : Dissolved Oxygen Level in River Water Prediction
item.description: Referred the Dissolved Oxygen Level in River Water dataset from Kaggle The dataset contained 37 discrete features, having majority of NaN values Dropped the features containing more than 60% of NaN values, and replaced the NaN values with the mean value of that feature for the important features Performed EDA and handled outliers present within the dataset Firstly solved the problem as a Regression setting and achieved RSquared value of 0.

item.title: Project V : University Salaries Prediction
item.description: Referred the University Salaries dataset from Kaggle which included the base pay of the Professors from the University of Vermount (UVM) from 2009 to 2021 The dataset contained 14470 records including no missing values Performed EDA and found out that there are no outliers present within the dataset Solved the problem using standard procedure as well as by using sklearn Pipeline

item.title: Project VI : Credit Card Fraud Detection
item.description: Referred the Credit Card Fraud Detection dataset from Kaggle The provided dataset was the result of a PCA Dimensionality reduction to protect user identities and sensitive features The dataset contained 284807 records with 31 features having no missing values Performed EDA to find the imbalance nature of the dataset with 284315 Normal Transaction and only 492 Fraudulent Transactions Performed Over Sampling method using imblearn library in order to overcome this problem

item.title: Project VII : Wine Quality Prediction
item.description: Referred the Wine Quality dataset from Kaggle The dataset contained 1599 records with 12 features having no missing values Performed EDA and handled outliers present within the dataset Used K Means Clustering : An Unsupervised Machine Learning technique to detect the clusters formed within the dataset Used PCA to reduce the dimensions in order to visualize the cluster formed along with their centroids
